title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1ยง 5.4 - Labeling of containers of milk drippings, milk rinsings, mixtures or combinations thereof
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1ยง 5.4 - Labeling of containers of milk drippings, milk rinsings, mixtures or combinations thereof

State Regulations

Prior to collection, during collection, during
transportation and until the contents have been emptied therefrom, each can
intended for use or used for milk drippings, milk rinsings, mixtures or
combinations thereof shall have securely attached thereto a red tag not less
than 2" x 4" in size upon which shall be printed conspicuously in block letters
at least one-half inch in height the words "Milk Drippings," "Milk Rinsings" or
"Mixture," or any combination of such words which will properly describe the
contents of the can. The name and address of the operator of the plant where
such products were recovered, the location of the plant, the name of the
collector and the date of collection or recovery shall be plainly printed or
stamped upon each such tag. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1ยง
5.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
